code: import{action_type}from"../contants/action-types";export var SetProducts=function SetProducts(products){return{type:action_type.SET_PRODUCTS,payload:products};};export var SetProductsList=function SetProductsList(productList){return{type:action_type.SET_PRODUCT_LIST,payload:productList};};export var SelectProduct=function SelectProduct(product){return{type:action_type.SELECTED_PRODUCT,payload:product};};export var categoryProducts=function categoryProducts(category){return{type:action_type.CATEGORY,payload:category};};export var removeProduct=function removeProduct(){return{type:action_type.REMOVE_SELECTED_PRODUCT};};export var incremented=function incremented(num){return{type:action_type.INCREASE,payload:num};};export var decremented=function decremented(num){return{type:action_type.DECREASE,payload:num};};export var geturl=function geturl(url){return{type:action_type.GETURL,payload:url};};
